DAO Treasury Management System - VS Code Copilot Instructions

This is a complete Web3 DAO Treasury Management System built with:
- Smart Contracts: Solidity with Hardhat
- Frontend: React.js with ethers.js for Web3 integration
- Testing: Hardhat and Jest
- Deployment: Local Hardhat network and testnet support

Project Structure:
- /contracts: Solidity smart contracts (GovernanceToken, TreasuryDAO)
- /frontend: React.js dashboard application
- /scripts: Deployment and setup scripts
- /test: Smart contract and integration tests

Key Features:
- ERC20 Governance Token for voting
- Treasury management with proposal system
- Voting mechanism with token-weighted decisions
- Analytics dashboard with Web3 wallet integration
- Transparent on-chain transaction tracking
